WorkItem.Description:
I have received many 'debug info' files from anonymous users. Thanks to them.

When an error message like "Verification of file signature failed for file" appear, I have notice that user have generated a auto-signed certificat or load a certificat but they had certainly omit to restart the Wsus server to take this change in account. 

Added a message when generate or load a certificate to warn the user that he need to restart his serveur.
WorkItem.Summary: Verification of file signature failed for file
